XI.ii.3.E.11.b
.
Claims for Reimbursement
Provide
VA Form 21P-601, Application for Accrued Amounts Due a Deceased Beneficiary
,
to the person who
paid the expenses of the last illness and/or burial of the deceased beneficiary, or
is held responsible by the unpaid creditors for the payment of the deceased beneficiary’s bills.
References
:  For more information on
the types of benefits that can be paid as accrued, see
M21-1, Part I, Subpart ii, 2
development for accrued benefits and the right to substitute, see
M21-1 Part XI, Subpart ii, 3.C
, and
claims applications and initial actions, see
M21-1, Part II, Subpart iii, 1.A
.
title: M21-1, Part XI, Subpart ii, Chapter 3, Section E  - Accrued Authorization and Notification
citation: Part XI, Subpart ii, Chapter 3, Section E
